briefTitle: Safety Study of Levocetirizine Dihydrochloride Oral Liquid Formulation in Children Aged 6 Months to 11 Months
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Parallel-Group Study of the Safety of Levocetirizine Dihydrochloride Oral Liquid Formulation in Children Aged 6 Months to 11 Months With Symptoms of Allergic Rhinitis or Chronic Urticaria.
summary: To determine the safety of levocetirizine in children ages 6-11 months with symptoms of allergic rhinitis or chronic idiopathic urticaria.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline at Visit 4 (Day 14) or at Early Discontinuation Visit (EDV) in Ventricular Rate (VR)
